AUDITOR OF PUBLIC ACCOUNTS 47 o STATE OF NEBRASKA Office of the Auditor of Public Accounts It is hereby certified that the foregoing ai'e true statements of the appropriations made and the moneys expended by the Fortieth Session of the Legislature of the State of Nebraska, up to and including the thirty-first day of May, 1921, specifying the amount of each item, and to whom and for what paid, as provided by Section 25, Article III, of the constitution. IN TESTIMONY WHEREOF, I have hereunto set my hand and af - fixed my official seal this first day of June, 1921. GEORGE W. MARSH, Auditor of Public Accounts. (SEAL) Attest: JOHN W. REINHARDT, Deputy.
